net.semanticmetadata.lire.ImageSearcher

Uses of ImageSearcher in net.semanticmetadata.lire
 

Classes in net.semanticmetadata.lire that implement ImageSearcher
 class AbstractImageSearcher
          Abstract ImageSearcher, which uses javax.imageio.ImageIO to create a BufferedImage from an InputStream.
 

Methods in net.semanticmetadata.lire that return ImageSearcher
static ImageSearcher ImageSearcherFactory.createAutoColorCorrelogramImageSearcher(int maximumHits)
          Create and return an ImageSearcher for the AutoColorCorrelogram image feature.
static ImageSearcher ImageSearcherFactory.createCEDDImageSearcher(int maximumHits)
          Create and return an ImageSearcher for the CEDD image feature.
static ImageSearcher ImageSearcherFactory.createColorHistogramImageSearcher(int maximumHits)
          Create and return an ImageSearcher for the SimpleColorHistogram image feature.
static ImageSearcher ImageSearcherFactory.createColorLayoutImageSearcher(int maximumHits)
          Create and return an ImageSearcher for the ColorLayout image feature using the byte[] serialization.
static ImageSearcher ImageSearcherFactory.createColorOnlySearcher(int maximumHits)
          Deprecated. Use ColorHistogram or ScalableColor instead
static ImageSearcher ImageSearcherFactory.createDefaultSearcher()
          Returns a new default ImageSearcher with a predefined number of maximum hits defined in the ImageSearcherFactory.NUM_MAX_HITS based on the CEDD feature
static ImageSearcher ImageSearcherFactory.createEdgeHistogramImageSearcher(int maximumHits)
          Create and return an ImageSearcher for the EdgeHistogram image feature using the byte[] serialization.
static ImageSearcher ImageSearcherFactory.createFastCorrelogramImageSearcher(int maximumHits)
          Deprecated. Use #createAutoColorCorrelogramImageSearcher instead
static ImageSearcher ImageSearcherFactory.createFCTHImageSearcher(int maximumHits)
          Create and return an ImageSearcher for the FCTH image feature.
static ImageSearcher ImageSearcherFactory.createGaborImageSearcher(int maximumHits)
          Create and return an ImageSearcher for the Gabor image feature.
static ImageSearcher ImageSearcherFactory.createJCDImageSearcher(int maximumHits)
          Create and return an ImageSearcher for the JCD image feature.
static ImageSearcher ImageSearcherFactory.createJpegCoefficientHistogramImageSearcher(int maximumHits)
          Create and return an ImageSearcher for the JpegCoefficientHistogram image feature.
static ImageSearcher ImageSearcherFactory.createScalableColorImageSearcher(int maximumHits)
          Create and return an ImageSearcher for the ScalableColor image feature using the byte[] serialization.
static ImageSearcher ImageSearcherFactory.createSimpleSearcher(int maximumHits)
          Deprecated. Use ColorLayout, EdgeHistogram and ScalableColor features instead.
static ImageSearcher ImageSearcherFactory.createTamuraImageSearcher(int maximumHits)
          Create and return an ImageSearcher for the Tamura image feature.
static ImageSearcher ImageSearcherFactory.createWeightedSearcher(int maximumHits, float colorHistogramWeight, float colorDistributionWeight, float textureWeight)
          Deprecated. Use ColorLayout, EdgeHistogram and ScalableColor features instead.

          Deprecated. use GenericFastImageSearcher instead

          Provides a faster way of searching based on byte arrays instead of Strings.
